info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued April 5 at 3:09AM CDT until April 5 at 8:15AM CDT by NWS Paducah KY
info.description:
FFWPAH
The National Weather Service in Paducah has extended the
* Flash Flood Warning for... Alexander County in southern Illinois... Scott County in southeastern Missouri... Stoddard County in southeastern Missouri...
* Until 815 AM CDT.
* At 309 AM CDT, emergency management reported thunderstorms producing heavy rain. Flash flooding continues from Advance to Olive Branch. Between 4 and 6 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring.
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding.
SOURCE...Emergency management reported.
IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Sikeston, Dexter, Scott City, Chaffee, Cairo, Bernie, Bloomfield, Advance, Oran, Miner, Benton, Morehouse, Puxico, Morley, Tamms, Kelso, Essex, Bell City, Dudley and Hay-Wood City.
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.

parameter.value: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 8:15 AM CDT. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD WARNING is in effect for this area until 8:15 AM CDT. This is a dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

area.areaDesc: Alexander, IL; Scott, MO; Stoddard, MO

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 8:15 AM CDT. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 8:15 AM CDT. Esta es una situacion peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.

area.areaDesc: Alexander, IL; Scott, MO; Stoddard, MO
